description: A fast-growing, globally distributed company determined to provide people with exceptional shared gaming experiences is looking for a Front-End Developer. The selected candidate will be tasked with designing, developing, and maintaining fluid and intuitive front-end applications. The US-based company is developing core games for tablet, mobile, and emerging platforms. They have managed to secure $70mn+ in funding so far. This will be a full-time position that requires some overlap with the BRT time zone.
